titleStmt.title: Christophilos. The true Christian subiect decyphered in a sermon preached at Saint Pauls London, on the seventh of August, Anno 1642. By Benjamin Spencer, Minister of St. Thomas Parish in Southwarke.
titleStmt.author: Spencer, Benjamin, b. 1595?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Paybody, dwelling in Pater-Noster Row, in Queenes Head Court,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
